resources.string: #TODO To control PAC-MAN swipe up, down, left and right or use the on screen arrows. Collect pellets, power pellets allow you to catch ghosts. Avoid ghosts Blinky, Pinky, Inky and Clyde. Collect all pellets in the stage to win. This is a demo so even if you lose, you will progress to the next stage to expereince all stages and all the different special power ups in the game.

"PAC-MAN NOT BY NAMCO" MABE BY MILAN
 SPRITES: CLASSIC NAMCO PAC-MAN SPRIETS FROM VG SPRITES RESOURCE
 1ST STAGE: CLASSIC PAC-MAN
 2ND STAGE: HIGHWAY FROM PAC-MAN CHAMPIONSHIP EDITION DX+
 3RD STAGE: ORIGINAL STAGE
 BONUS STAGE: NOKIA SNAKE
 SFX: CLASSIC PAC-MAN FROM VG SOUND RESOURCE
 MUSIC: CLASSIC PAC-MAN AND PAC-MAN CHAMPIONSHIP EDITION DX+
